lead_paragraph: Mikhail Y. Lesin, once a player in the Kremlin’s media apparatus, was found dead from “blunt force injuries” in Washington, fueling speculation of murder.

headline.print_headline: Mysterious Death Follows Swift Fall From Kremlin
headline.main: Mikhail Lesin’s Strange Death in U.S. Follows a Fall From Russia’s Elite

snippet: Mikhail Y. Lesin, once a player in the Kremlin’s media apparatus, was found dead from “blunt force injuries” in Washington, fueling speculation of murder.
abstract: Death of Russian business man Mikhail Y Lesin, whose body was found in Washington, DC, hotel room in November 2015 following abrupt dismissal from Kremlin media apparatus, has fueled speculation he may have been murdered; Lesin, who was preparing to join ranks of Russian exiles in United States, was notable for his influential role in Vladimir V Putin's rise to power and later precipitous fall from grace.
